escjava.dfa.cfd
Class CodeNode

java.lang.Object
  escjava.dfa.cfd.Node
      escjava.dfa.cfd.CodeNode

public class CodeNode
extends Node

This class represents a node in control flow diagram that represent a piece of code in program.

computeSp

public javafe.ast.Expr computeSp(javafe.ast.Expr pre)
Computes the stronest postcondition of this node, given a precondition. This implementation assumes that the code associated to this node is one of the commands ASSERT, ASSUME, SKIP.

Specified by:
computeSp in class Node
Parameters:
pre - precondition

shallowCopy

public Node shallowCopy()
Description copied from class: Node
Creates a shallow copy of the node, the parents and children should remain emtpy. This method is used in cloning of the graph which takes care of the edges.

Specified by:
shallowCopy in class Node
